attributes.action: convict and jail Uri Geller for Fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For over 30 years Uri Geller has been telling the world that he has supernatural powers.  He has made millions of pounds from this claim.  This claim has been shown time and again to be false.  He should now be required by law to prove that he indeed does have supernatural powers, or be convicted of fraud.

rejection.details: The Government cannot arbitrarily convict and jail people.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
